languages.text: Архонт, предавший Маражая, сполна получил за свое вероломство. Круг бесконечных друкарских предательств наконец-то замкнулся — и победителем вышел тот, кто долгое время оставался лишь пешкой в этой расстановке.

The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.
languages.original_text: Архонт, предавший Маражая, сполна получил за свое вероломство. Круг бесконечных друкарских предательств наконец-то замкнулся — и победителем вышел тот, кто долгое время оставался лишь пешкой в этой расстановке.

traits.locale_text: The Archon who had double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

The Archon who had double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

languages.text: L'archonte qui a trahi Marazhai a eu ce qu'il méritait. Le cycle de trahison des Drukharis est enfin terminé, et la victoire a été remportée par celui qui n'était jusqu'alors qu'un simple pion dans ce jeu meurtrier.
languages.original_text: The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

traits.locale_text: L'archonte qui a trahi Marazhai a eu ce qu'il méritait. Le cycle de trahison des Drukharis est enfin terminé, et la victoire a été remportée par celui qui n'était jusqu'alors qu'un simple pion dans ce jeu meurtrier.

languages.text: 出卖玛拉斋的执政官得到了应得的下场，黑暗灵族之间没完没了的背叛终于结束了。玛拉斋原本只是这场杀戮游戏中的一个棋子，而现在，他成了这场游戏的赢家。
languages.original_text: The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

traits.locale_text: 出卖玛拉斋的执政官得到了应得的下场，黑暗灵族之间没完没了的背叛终于结束了。玛拉斋原本只是这场杀戮游戏中的一个棋子，而现在，他成了这场游戏的赢家。

languages.text: マラズハイを裏切ったアーコンは自業自得の結果となった。デュカーリの果てしなく続く裏切りの輪がついに完成した。そして、この殺人ゲームの駒に過ぎなかった者が、勝利を手にしたのだ。
languages.original_text: The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイを裏切ったアーコンは自業自得の結果となった。デュカーリの果てしなく続く裏切りの輪がついに完成した。そして、この殺人ゲームの駒に過ぎなかった者が、勝利を手にしたのだ。

languages.text: Der Archon hat nur bekommen, was er verdient hat. Er hatte Marazhai hintergangen. Der Kreis des unaufhörlichen Drukhari-Verrats hat sich endlich geschlossen. Und errungen hat den Sieg der Mann, der bisher nur ein bloßer Bauer in diesen mörderischen Spiel gewesen war.
languages.original_text: The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

traits.locale_text: Der Archon hat nur bekommen, was er verdient hat. Er hatte Marazhai hintergangen. Der Kreis des unaufhörlichen Drukhari-Verrats hat sich endlich geschlossen. Und errungen hat den Sieg der Mann, der bisher nur ein bloßer Bauer in diesen mörderischen Spiel gewesen war.

languages.text: El Arconte que traicionó a Marazhai se ha llevado su merecido. El incesante círculo de traiciones Drukhari ha terminado y la victoria corresponde al que hasta hace poco era un simple peón en la partida.
languages.original_text: The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.

traits.locale_text: El Arconte que traicionó a Marazhai se ha llevado su merecido. El incesante círculo de traiciones Drukhari ha terminado y la victoria corresponde al que hasta hace poco era un simple peón en la partida.

languages.text: Marazhai'a ihanet eden Arkon, hak ettiğini aldı. Sonsuz Drukhari ihanet çemberi nihayet tamamlandı. Bu ölümcül oyunda yalnızca bir piyon olarak kalan kişi, zafere ulaştı.
languages.original_text: The Archon who double-crossed Marazhai got just what he deserved. The circle of incessant Drukhari betrayals is finally complete — and the victory was claimed by he who had previously remained a mere pawn in this murderous game.
